page.title: 08Fear in Wolverhampton
page.content:
The rate of violence in Wolverhampton has increased a great deal over the last few years,partly because of unemployment. People who are on their own are beginning to be frightened to go out of the house because of the mobs of unemployed youths who hang around the streets looking for trouble. A few weeks ago,three masked men armed with baseball bats charged into a fish and chip shop.The owners wife tried hard to protect the till,but was thrown to the ground after being beaten with the baseball bats.The men got away with all that days takings.
Vicki Connop and Sunita Patel.
